entry.def: Edging is something that is put along the borders or sides of something else, usually to make it look attractive.

example.tran: 兰德尔的毛毯的绸缎饰边

means.word_mean: 1. border consisting of anything placed on the edge to finish something (such as a fringe on clothing or on a rug)
